CustomField.description: Campo que almacena el importe de la deuda del titular
CustomField.formula: IF( AV_CurrentBalanceAmount1__c>= 1000000, TEXT(FLOOR(AV_CurrentBalanceAmount1__c/ 1000000)) & ".", "") & IF( AV_CurrentBalanceAmount1__c>= 1000, RIGHT(TEXT(FLOOR(AV_CurrentBalanceAmount1__c/ 1000)), 3) & ".", "") & RIGHT(TEXT(FLOOR(AV_CurrentBalanceAmount1__c)), 3) & " " & AV_CurrentBalanceCCY1__c
CustomField.label: Importe deuda titular
